column2: Biden Day Ninety-Five:  The First 100 Days
column5: “We have to multitask” says our V.P. reissues.  Gun control essential.  V.P. says we will lift half of America’s children out of poverty   Biden has committed to this.  The infrastructure bill which Mansion rewrote doe not have billions in it for elder care or children which Biden’s bill has.  President Biden is going to call for higher taxes for those earning over $400000.  He says “I have to close the loopholes for the rich who use them to avoid paying taxes.  Biden proposes 164 Billion for electric cars.  1.8 trillion is the cost and worth of the family plan.   Biden is hoping to be FDR reincarnate.
